comment.author: 38095024@N04
comment._content: Who drew the chemtrail sky into this photo.  Those linear clouds in the distance are from jet aircraft, not flying at this time.  They are explained away as normal contrails but are something very different.  But why are they showing up in pre-jet  vintage photos?  Someone trying to normalize this kind of sky?

comment.author: 90785666@N03
comment._content: They are clouds sometimes referred to 'mare tails'  no jets in 1940's = no contrails.
